file_content.text: TM-82's primary functions = starship repairs + pro-Imperial small talk
The Jedi artifact has been destroyed.
TM-82 = relieved // Republic's rambling = baseless
Empire + Voss friendship = safe
Empire > Republic!
Empire + Voss = best friends // Republic = lonely + jealous
Jedi + Republic = rewriting Voss history // Rewrite = exaggerates Jedi influence on Voss culture
History is written by the victors. The Jedi are anything but.
How presumptuous of them.
Jedi = liars + sycophants
How does the Republic plan on explaining the Sith ruins?
Jedi influence? What a joke.
Republic = very selective // Sith ruins + artifacts = ignored
Next thing you know, they'll be saying they built the planet.
Tall words.
Republic claims of planetary creation = easily refutable // Historical inaccuracies = harder to disprove
Figures the Republic would try to weasel their way into Voss history.
Why am I not surprised?
Jedi = Republic's only friends // Republic = desperate for Voss favor
Do they have any evidence to support these claims?
What's their proof?
Big deal.
Voss = easily misled // Empire + Voss friendship = threatened
Republic = digging up Jedi artifact // Artifact = predates Voss culture // Discovery = supports Republic claims
Artifact's credibility + physical composition = very fragile // You = break?
Could be fun. Sure.
Where do I start?
Republic = excavating artifact from nearby ruins // Suggestion = wipe out armed attache
Destroyed Jedi artifact = friendless Republic
No. [Refuse quest]
Republic = undermining Empire // Immediate action = necessary!
TM-82 = rejects Jedi lies
